title: Apple macOS IOAccelSharedUserClient2 Untrusted Pointer Dereference Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on vulnerable installations of Apple macOS. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the IOAccelSharedUserClient2 call. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of a user-supplied value prior to dereferencing it as a pointer. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges and execute code in the context of the kernel.
addtionnal_details: Apple has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT210119
timeline:
2019-04-03 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2019-05-30 - Coordinated public release of advisory
credit: Lilang Wu and Moony Li of TrendMicro Mobile Security Research Team
